dashboard.description: Dashboard that graphs metrics exported via Prometheus plugin in Kong (http://github.com/kong/kong)

targets.expr: sum(kong_nginx_connections_total{state=~"active|reading|writing|waiting", chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network"}) by (chain, servicetype, network, state)
sum(kong_nginx_connections_total{state=~"active|reading|writing|waiting", chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network"}) by (chain, servicetype, network, state)

sum(kong_nginx_connections_total{state=~"active|reading|writing|waiting", chain=~"APT", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network", region=~"$region", instance=~"$instance:8001"}) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, state)

sum(kong_nginx_connections_total{state=~"active|reading|writing|waiting", chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network", region=~"$region"}) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, state)
sum(kong_nginx_connections_total{state="total", chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network", region=~"$region"})
sum(kong_nginx_connections_total{state="handled", chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network", region=~"$region"})
sum(kong_nginx_connections_total{state="accepted", chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network", region=~"$region"})
sum by (chain, servicetype, network, region, instance, code) (rate(kong_http_requests_total{chain="$chain", network="$network", code="200"}[1m]))

panels.title: Total requests per second (RPS) by Region [200 Status code]

targets.expr: sum by (chain, servicetype, network, consumer, code) (rate(kong_http_requests_total{chain="$chain", network="$network", code="200",}[1m]))

panels.title: Total requests per second (RPS) by Consumer [200 Status code]

targets.expr: sum by (chain, servicetype, network, region, instance, consumer, code) (rate(kong_http_requests_total{chain="$chain", network="$network"}[1m]))

panels.title: Total requests per second (RPS) by Region, Consumer, Status code

targets.expr: sum(rate(kong_http_requests_total{service=~"$service", service!="test", route=~"$route", chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,code, instance)

panels.title: Total requests per second (RPS) by Region, Status code

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(kong_request_latency_ms_bucket{service=~"$service", service!="test", service!="test",route=~"$route",chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(kong_request_latency_ms_bucket{service=~"$service", service!="test", service!="test",route=~"$route",chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(kong_request_latency_ms_bucket{service=~"$service", service!="test", service!="test",route=~"$route",chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(kong_request_latency_ms_bucket{service=~"$service", service!="test", service!="test",route=~"$route",chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(kong_kong_latency_ms_bucket{service=~"$service", service!="test", service!="test",route=~"$route",chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(kong_kong_latency_ms_bucket{service=~"$service", service!="test", service!="test",route=~"$route",chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(kong_kong_latency_ms_bucket{service=~"$service", service!="test", service!="test",route=~"$route",chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(kong_kong_latency_ms_bucket{service=~"$service", service!="test", service!="test",route=~"$route",chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(kong_upstream_latency_ms_bucket{service=~"$service", service!="test", service!="test",route=~"$route",chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(kong_upstream_latency_ms_bucket{service=~"$service", service!="test", service!="test",route=~"$route",chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(kong_upstream_latency_ms_bucket{service=~"$service", service!="test", service!="test",route=~"$route",chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(kong_upstream_latency_ms_bucket{service=~"$service", service!="test", service!="test",route=~"$route",chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))
sum(irate(kong_bandwidth_bytes{chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network"}[1m])*8) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, type)

sum(irate(kong_bandwidth_bytes{exported_direction="egress", service =~"$service",route=~"$route",chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service)

sum(irate(kong_bandwidth_bytes{exported_direction="ingress", service =~"$service", chain="$chain", servicetype="$servicetype", network="$network"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service)

sum(kong_upstream_target_health{state="healthy",upstream=~"$upstream", chain="$chain", network="$network", servicetype="$servicetype"}) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, upstream,target,address) * -1  + sum(kong_upstream_target_health{state=~"(unhealthy|dns_error)",upstream=~"$upstream", chain="$chain", network="$network", servicetype="$servicetype"}) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, upstream,target,address)

(kong_memory_lua_shared_dict_bytes{chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network", region=~"$region",shared_dict!~"kong_process_events"}/kong_memory_lua_shared_dict_total_bytes{chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network", region=~"$region",shared_dict!~"kong_process_events"})*100

panels.title: Kong shared memory usage by Node [$region]

targets.expr: kong_memory_workers_lua_vms_bytes{chain=~"$chain", servicetype=~"$servicetype", network=~"$network", region=~"$region"}

panels.title: Kong worker Lua VM usage by Node [$region]

dashboard.title: Aptos_Fullnode_Kong
